.. _`design_system_components_objectheader`:

ObjectHeader
============

.. figure:: images/component_objectheader.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

A collapsible page header that displays object information. A thumbnail provides at-a-glance
visuals, while configurable attributes can display meta data such as PLM information.


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_thumbnail`
